scripts.build: npm run build-payment && npm run build-login
scripts.build-payment: npm run sdk-payment-button:build && npm run sdk-payment-modal-desktop:build && npm run sdk-payment-modal-mobile:build
scripts.build-login: npm run sdk-login-button:build && npm run sdk-login-modal-desktop:build && npm run sdk-login-modal-mobile:build
scripts.sdk-payment-button:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/payment-request-button/vite.config.ts
scripts.sdk-payment-modal-desktop:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/payment-request-modal-desktop/vite.config.ts
scripts.sdk-payment-modal-mobile:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/payment-request-modal-mobile/vite.config.ts
scripts.sdk-login-button:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/login-request-button/vite.config.ts
scripts.sdk-login-modal-desktop:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/login-request-modal-desktop/vite.config.ts
scripts.sdk-login-modal-mobile:build: npm run lib:build && NODE_ENV=production vite build -c ./apps/login-request-modal-mobile/vite.config.ts
